## Checklist

<!-- Mark completed items with an 'x' -->

### Code Quality
- [ ] My code follows the project's style guidelines
- [ ] I have performed a self-review of my code
- [ ] I have commented my code, particularly in hard-to-understand areas
- [ ] My changes generate no new warnings
- [ ] I have run `npm run lint` and fixed all issues
- [ ] I have run `npm run format` to format code
- [ ] I have run `npm run type-check` and resolved all type errors

### Documentation
- [ ] I have updated the documentation accordingly
- [ ] I have updated the README (if needed)
- [ ] I have added JSDoc comments to new functions
- [ ] I have updated the CHANGELOG.md

### Testing
- [ ] I have added tests that prove my fix is effective or that my feature works
- [ ] New and existing unit tests pass locally with my changes
- [ ] I have run `npm test` successfully
- [ ] I have tested on multiple browsers/devices

### Dependencies
- [ ] I have not added unnecessary dependencies
- [ ] All new dependencies are documented
- [ ] Package.json and package-lock.json are in sync

### Accessibility
- [ ] My changes maintain or improve accessibility
- [ ] Interactive elements are keyboard accessible
- [ ] ARIA labels are added where appropriate
- [ ] Color contrast meets WCAG standards

### Security
- [ ] My changes don't introduce security vulnerabilities
- [ ] User input is properly validated/sanitized
- [ ] Sensitive data is not exposed
